returns._1: hash - the hash of the checkpoint

params.messages: An array of cross-chain envelopes to be hashed.

returns._0: The keccak256 hash of the encoded cross-chain messages.

params.validator: The address of the checked validator
The address of the validator for which collateral is queried.
The address of the validator for which storage is queried.

params.validatorAddress: The address of the validator to query information for.

params.validator: The address of the checked validator.

activeValidatorsLimit().notice: Fetches the limit on the number of active validators.

bootstrapped().notice: Checks if the subnet has been bootstrapped.

bottomUpCheckPeriod().notice: Returns the period for bottom-up checkpointing operations.

bottomUpCheckpointAtEpoch(uint256).notice: returns the committed bottom-up checkpoint at specific epoch.

bottomUpCheckpointHashAtEpoch(uint256).notice: returns the historical committed bottom-up checkpoint hash.

collateralSource().notice: Returns the collateral asset kind for the subnet.

consensus().notice: Returns the consensus protocol type used in the subnet.

crossMsgsHash((uint8,((uint64,address[]).notice: Computes a hash of an array of IpcEnvelopes.

genesisBalances().notice: Retrieves initial balances and corresponding addresses of the genesis block.

genesisValidators().notice: Returns the initial set of validators of the genesis block.

getActiveValidatorsNumber().notice: Returns the number of active validators.

getConfigurationNumbers().notice: Returns the next and start configuration numbers related to the changes.

getPower(address).notice: Checks if the validator address is in an active state.

getTotalCollateral().notice: Returns the total collateral held by all validators.

getTotalConfirmedCollateral().notice: Returns the total amount of confirmed collateral across all validators.

getTotalConfirmedStorage().notice: Returns the total amount of confirmed storage across all validators.

getTotalValidatorCollateral(address).notice: Returns the total collateral amount for a specific validator.

getTotalValidatorStorage(address).notice: Returns the total storage amount for a specific validator.

getTotalValidatorsNumber().notice: Returns the total number of validators (active and waiting).

getValidator(address).notice: Returns detailed information about a specific validator.

isActiveValidator(address).notice: Checks if the validator address is an active validator

isWaitingValidator(address).notice: Checks if the validator is in a waiting state.

killed().notice: Checks if the subnet has been terminated or "killed".

lastBottomUpCheckpointHeight().notice: Returns the block height of the last bottom-up checkpoint.

majorityPercentage().notice: Returns the majority percentage required for consensus.

minActivationCollateral().notice: Returns the minimum collateral required for subnet activation.

minValidators().notice: Returns the minimum validators number needed to activate the subnet.

powerScale().notice: Returns the power scale in number of decimals from whole FIL.

supplySource().notice: Returns the supply strategy for the subnet.

tokensPerStorageRatio().notice: Returns the token per storage ratio for the subnet.
